data.eml:eml: First record of the genus Xenoplatyura Malloch, 1928 from China, with descriptions of three new species (Diptera: Keroplatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cao, Jian, Zhou, Zuji, Xu, Huachao, Wu, Hong (2007): First record of the genus Xenoplatyura Malloch, 1928 from China, with descriptions of three new species (Diptera: Keroplatidae). Zootaxa 1465: 31-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176547
